verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* blood.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H5927"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* learned \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4686"\w*.
